participant_1.background:
My family is supportive of my musical dreams, and we often go to the opera together.
I love to go to concerts with my friends because we can all sing and dance along.
I am a hard worker, and I don't let my height get in the way of my work.
My future clients will love how I've combined my love of cleanliness and my talent for planning to create the best wedding days of their lives.
I like to make things with my hands.

i live in new york and i love the local shops around here.
I enjoy the feeling of new sneakers on my feet.
I celebrated my birthday with my family and friends at a Chinese restaurant.
I like to collect little raincoat-wearing toys, especially the Disney ones.

content.text: How is your day going?
Pretty good, just got back from a trip to China.
Wow, that sounds like fun! Where did you go?
I went to Guilin, it's a beautiful city with amazing scenery.
I've heard of Guilin, it's supposed to be really nice.
It is! I loved the Li River, it was so serene and beautiful.
That sounds amazing.
It was. I also got to celebrate my birthday there, which was really special.
That's great! Happy belated birthday!
Thank you!
What did you do for your birthday?
I went to a Chinese restaurant with my family and friends, and we had a lot of fun.
That sounds like a great way to celebrate.
It was. I'm really glad I got to go to China for my birthday.
Me too. It sounds like you had a great time.
I did. I'm already planning my next trip!
Where are you thinking of going?
I'm not sure yet, but I'm thinking about going to Japan or Thailand.
Those are both great choices! I've been to Japan before, and it was amazing.
I've heard great things about Japan, so I'm really excited to go.
You'll love it!
I hope so!
I'm sure you will.
Thanks!
You're welcome!
